## Checklist

- [ ] All tests pass locally (`pytest tests/unit -v`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`ruff check src tests`, `isort --check-only --diff src tests`, `pydocstyle src`, `mypy src`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] If adding or modifying composite actions under `.github/actions/`: GHA expression context documentation follows the [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/btw-claude/developer-sentinel/blob/develop/CONTRIBUTING.md#github-actions-composite-action-documentation-ds-1050) (YAML-level comments for expression evaluation, no literal `${{ }}` in `run:` block comments)
